'''1.20.2 Pre-Release 3''' (known as '''1.20.2-pre3''' in the launcher) is the third pre-release for [[Java Edition 1.20.2]], released on September 12, 2023,<ref>{{Mcnet|minecraft-1-20-2-pre-release-3|Minecraft 1.20.2 Pre-Release 3|September 12, 2023}}</ref> which fixes bugs.

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|fixedin=1.20.2 Pre-Release 3
|;old
|82239|Minecarts riding minecarts are unrideable.
|255829|Villager trades air if it has a totem of undying trade and uses the held totem.
|;dev
|264564|Record attribute is stripped from records with no components.
|265335|Hoglins can't be bred.
|;previous
|265296|Player sits lower in minecarts.
}}</onlyinclude>

== Trivia ==
* Unlike the previous two pre-releases and all pre-releases since [[Java Edition 1.15.2 Pre-Release 2|1.15.2-pre2]], this version name has an uppercase "R" in-game much like [[Java Edition 1.15 Pre-Release 2|1.15-pre2]] and [[Java Edition 1.15.2 Pre-Release 1|1.15.2-pre1]].</onlyinclude>
